Package view.components.titlebar

Class TitleBarButton

java.lang.Object
view.components.titlebar.TitleBarButton
public abstract class TitleBarButton
extends java.lang.Object
Describes a title bar button. An instance of this class can be added to the TitleBar to be drawn and handled.
Author:
TRAFNY Theo - UPSSITECH

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public abstract void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g, int width, int height)
      Ask the button to be drawn with the given graphic context.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphic context.
      width - The width of the title bar.
      height - The height of the title bar.

    • click

      public void click()
      Called when the button has been clicked. It will call all registered action listeners.

    • addActionListener

      public void addActionListener​(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
      Register an action listener to listen press events.
      Parameters:
      listener -

    • isHover

      public boolean isHover​(int x, int y)
      Check if the location describes with x and y is in the boundaries of the button
      Parameters:
      x - x component of the location
      y - y component of the location
      Returns:
      is the location hover the button.
